title: DastarKhan - The Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Indian, Organic, Western, Buffet, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar
description: The foremost and only heritage property in India that serves 100% vegan food and only non-alcoholic beverages. Also uses organically grown vegetables. Traditional and skilled chefs specialize in Rajasthani, Kashmiri, Frontier and Continental exotic dishes. Located inside Hotel The Fort Ramgarh.
streetAddress: NH-73, The Fort Ramgarh, Opposite Sector 28
